title: Corrections and Clarifications
body:
While endeavouring to be fair and accurate in our reporting at all times, the 'Irish Independent' welcomes 
suggestions or complaints about errors in our coverage that should be corrected. Requests for corrections or 
clarifications should be sent by email to corrections@independent.ie or by post to Corrections, 'Irish 
Independent', Independent House, No 27-32 Talbot Street, Dublin 1.
